Handcrafted, home-made masterpieces


Premium Materials


All of our goods are designed and crafted by hand here in Bozeman, MT. Beyond our made-to-order products, we also do custom creations. Please send us an email, or call for more information on these projects!


Fast Shipping


We make sure you recieve your trombone as soon as we have finished making it. We also provide free returns if you are not satisfied.

Quality Assurance


For every purchase you make, we will ensure there are no damages or faults and we will check and test the pitch of your instrument.
